sn35.151:1.2: Santevasiko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sacariyako dukkham na phasu viharati.
sn35.151:1.3: Anantevasiko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anacariyako sukham phasu viharati.
sn35.151:1.4: Kathanca, bhikkhu, santevasiko sacariyako dukkham na phasu viharati?
sn35.151:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhuna rupam disva uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma sarasankappa samyojaniya.
sn35.151:1.6: Tyassa anto vasanti, antassa vasanti papaka akusala dhammati.
sn35.151:1.8: Te nam samudacaranti, samudacaranti nam papaka akusala dhammati.
sn35.151:2.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jivhaya rasam sayitva uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma sarasankappa samyojaniya.
sn35.151:2.2: Tyassa anto vasanti, antassa vasanti papaka akusala dhammati.
sn35.151:2.4: Te nam samudacaranti, samudacaranti nam papaka akusala dhammati. Tasma sacariyakoti vuccati …pe….
sn35.151:3.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno manasa dhammam vinnaya uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma sarasankappa samyojaniya.
sn35.151:3.2: Tyassa anto vasanti, antassa vasanti papaka akusala dhammati.
sn35.151:3.4: Te nam samudacaranti, samudacaranti nam papaka akusala dhammati.
sn35.151:3.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu santevasiko sacariyako dukkham, na phasu viharati.
sn35.151:4.1: Kathanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anantevasiko anacariyako sukham phasu viharati?
sn35.151:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno cakkhuna rupam disva na uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma sarasankappa samyojaniya.
sn35.151:4.3: Tyassa na anto vasanti, nassa anto vasanti papaka akusala dhammati.
sn35.151:4.5: Te nam na samudacaranti, na samudacaranti nam papaka akusala dhammati.
sn35.151:5.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno jivhaya rasam sayitva na uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma sarasankappa samyojaniya.
sn35.151:5.2: Tyassa na anto vasanti, nassa anto vasanti papaka akusala dhammati.
sn35.151:5.4: Te nam na samudacaranti, na samudacaranti nam papaka akusala dhammati. Tasma anacariyakoti vuccati …pe….
sn35.151:6.1: Puna caparam, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno manasa dhammam vinnaya na uppajjanti papaka akusala dhamma sarasankappa samyojaniya.
sn35.151:6.2: Tyassa na anto vasanti, nassa anto vasanti papaka akusala dhammati.
sn35.151:6.4: Te nam na samudacaranti, na samudacaranti nam papaka akusala dhammati.
sn35.151:6.6: Evam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anantevasiko anacariyako sukham phasu viharati.
sn35.151:6.8: Anacariyakam santevasiko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sacariyako dukkham, na phasu viharati.
sn35.151:6.9: Anantevasiko, bhikkhave, bhikkhu anacariyako sukham phasu viharati”ti.
